io.hekate.network.netty

Class NettyUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hekate.network.netty.NettyUtils

  • public final class NettyUtils
extends Object
    Netty-related utilities.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long GRACEFUL_SHUTDOWN_PERIOD
      Time period (=0L) in milliseconds for shutdown(EventExecutorGroup).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void runAtAllCost(io.netty.channel.EventLoop eventLoop, Runnable task)
      Executes the task using the provided event loop or falls back to AsyncUtils.fallbackExecutor() if event loop is shut down.
      static Waiting shutdown(io.netty.util.concurrent.EventExecutorGroup executor)
      Shuts down the specified executor with 0 graceful shutdown period.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public static Waiting shutdown(io.netty.util.concurrent.EventExecutorGroup executor)
        Shuts down the specified executor with 0 graceful shutdown period.
        Parameters:
        executor - Executor to shutdown (can be null).
        Returns:
        Waiting.

      • runAtAllCost

        public static void runAtAllCost(io.netty.channel.EventLoop eventLoop,
                                Runnable task)
        Executes the task using the provided event loop or falls back to AsyncUtils.fallbackExecutor() if event loop is shut down.
        Parameters:
        eventLoop - Event loop.
        task - Task.
